Text: i am slow today, but i cant get this to work says that a miss binkw32dll.file    any ideas?

Found this when i googelÂ´d the problem:
http://pcsupport.about.com/od/findbyerrormessage/a/binkw32dll.htm

Ok, did anyone succeed in installing this?

And HOW??

Moved the bink file about 10 times bu no luck in running the game..

Yay!! Found the mistake;

I thought this needed a separate folder in the Project Origin installation folder, but it didn't.
Once I installed it as an addition to the Project Origin-installation, I found Reborn in the Main Menu.
The bink-problem disappeared cause the .dll-file was already there in the first place.

Thanks for the UP!!
